page.title: 18Occupations in Fritchley
page.content: The range of occupations of the Fritchley population is extremely varied. 5% of the total are in primary industry, 26% in manufacturing, and 51% in services. Out of 81 people who responded to our survey, the largest group for one job was teaching (9), followed by the health service (8). Management catered for 8 jobs and Stevensons dyers in Bullbridge employed 8 people. Jobs such as weaver, confectioner, dental ceramist, sub postmaster, marine engineer and Assistant County Sailing Master are all included and this shows the diversity of employment. The location of people's work also varies, but there are only 3 people who have to travel more than 20 miles. 5 people work in Fritchley and 13 work within a mile of Fritchley. 50% live less than 5 miles away.
